snippet: Pinch-hitter Tyler Moore hit a two-run single in the eighth inning to help the Washington Nationals hold on against the St. Louis Cardinals in a tight and tentative contest.
abstract: Washington Nationals defeat St Louis Cardinals, 3-2, to lead National League division series, 1-0.
lead_paragraph: Pinch-hitter Tyler Moore hit a two-run single in the eighth inning to help the Washington Nationals hold on against the St. Louis Cardinals in a tight and tentative contest.

headline.seo: After Gio Gonzalez Finds Groove, Nationals Rally Past Cardinals for Series Lead
headline.main: Nationals Edge Out Cardinals With Late Rally
headline.print_headline: Ace Finds His Groove for the Nationals, and a Pinch-Hitter Finds a Hole
